items.name: Basic Resonator
items.description: A simple harmonic resonator for basic frequency matching.
items.lore_notes: First generation resonance technology. Widely adopted due to its simplicity and reliability in early space exploration. These modules formed the backbone of early sensor arrays and communication systems before more advanced focusing techniques were developed.
items.discovery_location: Old Terra Orbital Shipyards - Decommissioned Sector Gamma
items.maintenance_schedule: Inspect every 500 operational cycles. Replace crystal matrix after 2000 cycles.

items.name: Advanced Magitek Core
items.description: A sophisticated core that integrates magical and technological energies.
items.lore_notes: Fusion of ancient magic and modern technology. These cores are notoriously difficult to stabilize without proper Nethbound attunement rituals.
items.discovery_location: Recovered from a derelict Nethbound Scout in the Whispering Nebula
items.maintenance_schedule: Monthly attunement ritual. Recalibrate mana-matrix every 250 cycles.

items.name: Elite Gravitic Field Generator
items.description: A powerful device that manipulates gravitational fields with precision.
items.lore_notes: Advanced gravity manipulation technology, developed by Lokex Frame. Its internal workings are a closely guarded secret, rumored to involve micro-singularities.
items.discovery_location: Blacksite Research Facility Omega-7 (Post-raid data archive)
items.maintenance_schedule: Bi-weekly calibration of singularity core. Full diagnostic every 1000 cycles.

items.name: Legendary Thermal Regulator
items.description: An ancient device that can control thermal energy with incredible precision, rumored to be of Precursor origin.
items.lore_notes: A relic from a bygone era, its operational principles defy modern understanding. Its surface is cool to the touch, regardless of load.
items.discovery_location: Deep within the Xylosian Precursor Tombs
items.maintenance_schedule: Self-repairing. Requires psychic resonance check annually.

status_effects.effect_description: Reverts minor heat damage in area

items.name: Harmonic Blade
items.description: A melee weapon that emits resonant frequencies to disrupt molecular bonds upon impact.
items.lore_notes: Favored by agile combatants, the Harmonic Blade requires precise strikes to maximize its disruptive potential.
items.discovery_location: Hidden armories in the Neon District of Kai'Shan
items.maintenance_schedule: Sharpen emitter array and recalibrate frequency modulator after every 50 engagements.
items.legal_status: Legal in most systems, regulated in some high-security zones.

recipe_json.assembly_steps_description: Requires precise crystal tuning and energy matrix alignment.

items.name: Arcane Plate
items.description: Heavy armor that integrates magical protection with technological enhancements, offering robust defense.
items.lore_notes: The Arcane Plate is a testament to the Nethbound's mastery over Magitek, capable of shrugging off both mundane ballistics and hostile spells.
items.discovery_location: Forged in the Shadowlight Sanctums of Neth
items.maintenance_schedule: Weekly enchantment renewal. Full system diagnostic and plate resealing every 300 cycles.

status_effects.effect_description: Redirects a portion of kinetic impact energy into shields

items.name: Basic Gravitic Manipulator
items.description: A simple handheld tool for basic gravity manipulation tasks like lifting small objects or creating minor push/pull forces.
items.lore_notes: Commonly found in engineering bays and cargo holds. Limited in power but useful for delicate tasks.
items.maintenance_schedule: Clean focusing lens weekly. Replace energy cell as needed.

items.name: Heat Sink Pack
items.description: A pack of disposable heat sinks for rapid thermal management in emergency situations or for overclocked modules.
items.lore_notes: Essential for overclockers and those operating in high-heat environments. Each sink absorbs a significant amount of thermal energy before becoming saturated.
items.discovery_location: Widely available in tech stores and industrial depots.
items.maintenance_schedule: Store in a cool, dry place. Check expiry date.

items.name: Basic Spinjack Core
items.description: A spinal implant that stores and releases kinetic energy from movement, providing bursts of speed or power.
items.lore_notes: Basic kinetic energy storage technology. Often used by couriers and scouts. Early models had a noticeable 'whine' when charging.
items.discovery_location: Black market clinics in Drush territories.
items.maintenance_schedule: Bi-monthly recalibration of kinetic flywheel. Neural interface check every 6 months.

items.name: Turnstile Drive
items.description: Advanced propulsion system using asymmetrical resonance fields for rapid angular velocity changes.
items.lore_notes: Revolutionary propulsion technology using angular momentum. Allows for incredibly nimble spacecraft, but places high stress on pilots not used to it.
items.discovery_location: Developed in Lokex R&D Orbital Platforms.
items.maintenance_schedule: Resonance chamber alignment every 100 flight hours. Full diagnostic after high-G maneuvers.

items.name: Ionocaloric Mesh
items.description: Advanced thermal control system using ion cycling for precise temperature manipulation across a wide range.
items.lore_notes: Cutting-edge thermal management technology from Feap Wardens, capable of creating intense cold or heat locally. Often used in terraforming or sensitive lab environments.
items.discovery_location: Feap Warden Bio-Domes and Research Outposts.
items.maintenance_schedule: Ion filter replacement every 500 cycles. Full system flush and recalibration annually.

items.name: Modular Caboodler
items.description: Versatile utility system with interchangeable modules for various tasks, a true jack-of-all-trades device.
items.lore_notes: Revolutionary modular utility system. Its adaptability makes it popular with explorers and field technicians. The 'Caboodler' name is a folksy term that stuck.
items.discovery_location: Initially prototyped in asteroid belt workshops.
items.maintenance_schedule: Clean module interface contacts weekly. Run self-diagnostic monthly.

items.name: Rail Grindstone
items.description: Massive kinetic apparatus oscillating a dense mass between interdimensional portals for immense momentum storage and power generation.
items.lore_notes: Revolutionary power generation technology developed by The Shrow. The 'Grindstone' itself is a hyperdense exotic material. Its oscillations are said to echo across realities.
items.cultural_significance: The Shrow's Primary Power Source - Highly Secretive
items.discovery_location: Observed within Shrow Citadels (from a safe distance).
items.maintenance_schedule: Continuous portal alignment monitoring. Exotic material integrity scan monthly. Full system recalibration bi-annually.

items.name: Foundational Gravity-Tech Principles
items.description: A core data module containing the fundamental principles and equations for gravity manipulation. This is not a usable device itself, but the knowledge base for all gravitic engineering.
items.lore_notes: The culmination of centuries of research into the nature of gravity. Unlocking these principles was a turning point in interstellar civilization, leading to FTL travel and advanced construction.
items.discovery_location: Synthesized from multiple independent research projects.

items.name: Foundational Wave Manipulation Theory
items.description: A comprehensive data archive detailing the core theories and mathematics behind the manipulation of various wave spectra (EM, resonant, kinetic, etc.). Essential for advanced sensor, communication, and weapon systems.
items.lore_notes: Understanding wave manipulation allowed for breakthroughs in everything from long-range scanners to resonant weaponry and advanced shield technology. This knowledge underpins countless modern devices.
items.cultural_significance: Basis for Advanced Electronics and Energy Systems
items.discovery_location: Collaborative research across multiple star systems.
items.maintenance_schedule: Data redundancy checks, periodic updates with new theoretical models.

items.name: Basic Spacedrive Unit T1
items.description: An early-generation FTL (Faster-Than-Light) engine based on manipulating localized spacetime bubbles via controlled gravity waves. Reliable but slow by modern standards.
items.lore_notes: The first widely adopted FTL drive, revolutionizing interstellar travel and trade. These units are known for their distinctive hum and the slight visual distortion they create when active.
items.discovery_location: Developed at the Proxima Centauri Shipyards.
items.maintenance_schedule: Graviton emitter alignment every 100 jumps. Spacetime coil integrity check monthly.
items.legal_status: Legal, widely available for civilian and commercial use.

items.name: Directed Gravity Device T1
items.description: A handheld or mountable device capable of projecting a focused beam of gravitic force, allowing for basic push/pull manipulation of objects at a short range.
items.lore_notes: An evolution of the basic gravitic manipulator, this device focuses gravitic energy into a controllable beam. Common in construction, cargo handling, and some niche combat applications.
items.discovery_location: Standard issue on most Lokex Frame orbital facilities.
items.maintenance_schedule: Clean focusing lens weekly. Calibrate beam intensity monthly.
items.legal_status: Legal, some restrictions on beam strength in populated areas.
